alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms could impact parts of Taylor County this evening... Thunderstorms continue to develop and intensify over northwest Wisconsin. These storms are tracking southeast at 45 mph and could impact parts of north central Wisconsin, including Taylor County, early this evening. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If you have outdoor plans this evening, including camping or fishing, be alert for these storms. Think about shelter options and if they move into your immediate area, get inside a building.
